definition: A person who holds strong beliefs and has faith in a particular religious or spiritual system, often used to refer to individuals who actively practice their faith.

examples.german: Die gläubige Frau geht jeden Sonntag in die Kirche.
examples.english: The faithful woman goes to church every Sunday.

examples.german: Die gläubige Gemeinschaft feiert regelmäßig Gottesdienste.
examples.english: The faithful community regularly celebrates worship services.

examples.german: Die gläubige Familie liest jeden Abend in der Bibel.
examples.english: The faithful family reads the Bible every evening.
